content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Stop the glare and brightness\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Set up your monitor correctly when it is positioned to a window.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Make sure that sunlight does not shine directly in your monitor/laptop. Use blinds.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If possible, avoid placing your computer screen or monitor directly below an overhead light fixture\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":47022,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/5288e780-3ddb-47f0-8345-dae28edf96ee/17.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/5288e780-3ddb-47f0-8345-dae28edf96ee/17.JPG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"17.JPG\",\"name\":\"17.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"5288e780-3ddb-47f0-8345-dae28edf96ee\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":732,\"height\":640},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":24557,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/77eda6a2-f608-40b0-a23e-87b04b4c48a0/Picture17.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/77eda6a2-f608-40b0-a23e-87b04b4c48a0/Picture17.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture17.jpg\",\"name\":\"Picture17.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"77eda6a2-f608-40b0-a23e-87b04b4c48a0\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":760,\"height\":303},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
